Fact: The word "Oxymoron" is an oxymoron. 'oxy' comes from the Greek word that means dull, and 'moron' comes from the Greek word that means 'sharp'.

Source - Simple English Wikipedia
Fact. The Fact Core from Portal 2 lies all the time.

Fact: The UP 844 (the one in my sig, avatar, and name) is screwed. Its boiler is completely corroded and its tender is in poor condition. Nobody (other than the UP crew obviously) knows if she's going to run again

Fun fact: On this day, a long time ago, a man was born who would change the world forever by age 30. Though long dead now, he still inspires people to this day, his teachings are still taught to people around the world, and he is a hero of mine.

Happy birthday, Sir Isaac Newton.
Fun fact: The small piece of cloth that you find on the headrests of airplane, bus, and train seats is called an "antimacassar". It's designed to keep unguents off of fabric.
